features: ✿【Soothing & Moisturizing】The hydrating benefits of feminine oil coupled with the omega-6 fatty acids found in safflower yoni essential oil sprays help keep your skin and vaginal moisturized, the yoni essential oil spray is ingredients work together to deeply moisturize, nourish and soften.

✿【Organic Yoni Oil】 For your daily Vaginal health and optimal hygiene needs. The natural essential oils helps maintain Ph levels; deodorizes, soothes skin; ease discomfort, irritation, and itchiness; and keeps your V smelling fresh, and helps with Irregular cycles and menstrual pain.

✿【Improve Yoni Elastivity】This yoni oil is rich in antioxidants and provides effective relief from dryness, itch and mal odor resulting from workouts and menstruation while also promoting skin tone / elasticity and eliminating odor, sweetening your sacred with the fresh and clean fragrance.

✿【Ph Balanced】Different from other hygiene products for women our's yoni oil is natural which we don’t use any harsh chemicals making essential oil spray safe to use for all skin types. To help you feel refreshed and smell fabulous, our feminine vaginal oil blend will help promote balanced ph along with leaving behind a subtle refreshing scent.

✿【All For Women】Yoni essential oil for woman is 100% organic, hypoallergenic moisturizer spray that can help combat symptoms of BV, and menopause. The ingredients were carefully selected for their time-tested effectiveness in gently treating feminine issues like vaginal dryness, irritation and itchiness.
body.description: ✿Yoni Essential Oil is a feminine care specially developed to refresh and care for your intimate area every day. It helps to keep the microflora of the skin of your intimate area in a healthy balance by maintaining the natural PH. ✿Usage: Apply 2-3 drops to clean hand and apply to clean female intimate part or apply directly to your panty liner or pad. ✿Features & Benefits You’ll Love: ☞- This hydrating essential oil blend locks the moisture in place helping you feel fresh all day ☞- Promote skin elasticity and reduces visibility of sagging skin and wrinkles ☞- Helps reduce the visibility of signs of aging and promote smoother skin ☞- It can easily be incorporated into your daily care routine without any special preparations

reviews.reviewText: This oil has a nice, mild refreshing scent. I was hoping for a stronger honeydew scent but it's refreshing nonetheless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything was great. I got product with ease and I love the product. 😌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As we get older things change and so do our bodies. Been looking for something natural to use in order to rebalance my feminine pH.Has a strong pungent odor, mainly from the tea tree extract, but the warm soothing feeling it provides is worth this small distraction. Have only had the opportunity to utilize it once but already I feel like it’s doing the job intended and if nothing else, feels very soothing.Would recommend to those wishing to rebalance their feminine pH and get back their confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not warn not to use when pregnant!!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I am very upset I thoroughly read the product description and no where did it say not recommended to use while pregnant so I ordered it waited for it to get here, just to read the box and see that I cannot even use it! I am so upset.

reviews.reviewText: does not smell like honeydew or cantaloupe at all. i actually bought another melon oil from online that smells exactly like the fruit with the same ingredients it made my mouth water. sad. don’t buy this one.
